# fmc_geolocations (Data Source)

This data source reads the Geolocations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "fmc_geolocations" "example" {
  items = {
    "my_geolocations" = {
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `domain` (String) Name of the FMC domain
- `items` (Attributes Map) Map of Geolocations. The key of the map is the name of the individual Geolocation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Id of the object

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `continents` (Attributes List) List of Continents. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--continents))
- `countries` (Attributes List) List of Countries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--countries))
- `id` (String) Id of the Geolocation.
- `type` (String) Type of the object; this value is always 'Geolocation'.

<a id="nestedatt--items--continents"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.continents`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) Id of the Continent.


<a id="nestedatt--items--countries"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.countries`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) Id of the Country.
